content:
Sure, here's a more romantic and heart-felt song for you:

Verse 1:
G A B C D E D C B A G
When I first saw you, my heart skipped a beat
G A B C D E D C B A G
I knew right then, you were someone I'd need
G A B C D E D C B A G
You smiled at me, and my heart took flight
G A B C D E D C B A G
I knew in that moment, you were my light

Chorus:
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
You're the one I want, the one I need
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
In your eyes, I see my destiny
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
With you by my side, I can face anything
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
Forever and always, my heart will sing

Verse 2:
G A B C D E D C B A G
You bring color to my world, where there was none
G A B C D E D C B A G
You make me feel alive, like the rising sun
G A B C D E D C B A G
Your touch ignites a flame, that never fades
G A B C D E D C B A G
With you beside me, I'm unafraid

Chorus:
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
You're the one I want, the one I need
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
In your eyes, I see my destiny
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
With you by my side, I can face anything
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
Forever and always, my heart will sing

Bridge:
G A B C D E F E D C B A G
I promise to love you, for all time
G A B C D E F E D C B A G
Together we'll weather any climb
G A B C D E F E D C B A G
Our love will be the light, that guides the way
G A B C D E F E D C B A G
Together forever, come what may

Chorus:
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
You're the one I want, the one I need
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
In your eyes, I see my destiny
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
With you by my side, I can face anything
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
Forever and always, my heart will sing

Outro:
G A B C D E D C B A G
I love you more, with every passing day
G A B C D E D C B A G
I'll always be here, no matter the way
G A B C D E D C B A G
Forever and always, my heart is yours
G A B C D E D C B A G
My love for you, forever endures.
